name: Versus Hockey
description:
A twist on air hockey to include "characters" with special moves. 

Controls:

P1: WASD to move, F / G for Speed Boost / Spikes

P2: Arrows to move, < / > for Speed Boost / Spikes

Updates would include a menu and multiple moves to choose from along with character customization, but it'll be released for now before it's put on indefinite hold.

Game made in Godot, some graphics made in Inkscape.
Special thanks to KidsCanCode for helping me deal with rigidbodies and @sevenloco (Twitter) for the confetti suggestion, along with others for playtesting.
